original_text: Adonijah and all the people who were with him heard the noise. They had just finished eating their feast together. When Joab heard the sound of the trumpet, he asked, ‘Why is there all that noise in the city?’
korean_text: 아도니야와 그와 함께 한 손님들이 먹기를 마칠 때에 다 들은지라 요압이 뿔나팔 소리를 듣고 이르되 어찌하여 성읍 중에서 소리가 요란하냐

sentences.original_text: and all the people who were with him heard the noise
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 모든 사람도 소리를 들었다

sentences.original_text: They had just finished eating their feast together
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 함께 잔치를 마치고 방금 끝냈다

sentences.original_text: When Joab heard the sound of the trumpet
Why is there all that noise in the city?
sentences.korean_translation: 어째서 도시에 그렇게 시끄러운 소리가 있습니까?
